Class CanonicalizerSpi

java.lang.Object

Direct Known Subclasses:
Canonicalizer20010315, Canonicalizer20010315WithoutXPathSupport
public abstract class CanonicalizerSpi
extends java.lang.Object

Base class which all Caninicalization algorithms extend.

Author:
Christian Geuer-Pollmann

engineSetXPath

public void engineSetXPath(java.lang.Object _context)
                    throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                           org.w3c.dom.DOMException
Sets the XPath which is beeing used by this Canonicalizer. This method can get the XPath as pure String, as an ds:XPath element or as NodeList which contains a ds:XPath element.
